faq_description: Find answers to common questions about our AI Music Generator
question_1: What types of prompts work best with AI Music Generator?
answer_1: Clear and specific prompts work best. Good lighting and a neutral background will help our AI create the best results. Avoid overly general or ambiguous prompts.
question_2: How long does it take to generate AI music?
answer_2: Most generations complete in just 2-5 minutes, depending on server load and the complexity of the prompt. Pro users receive priority processing for even faster results.
question_3: Can I use AI Music Generator for free?
answer_3: Free users can generate once upon registration and need to log in. For additional features and higher usage limits, upgrade your plan.
question_4: What styles of music can I generate?
answer_4: We offer a wide range of styles, including popular genres like Classical, Jazz, Rock, Pop, Electronic, and Hip-Hop. Beyond these presets, you can also use our Text to Music AI Generator to generate music based on your text descriptions.
question_5: How does AI Music Generator handle user privacy?
answer_5: We prioritize your privacy. Prompts are used only to generate your music and are generally deleted after 24 hours. We never store or retain your uploaded prompts on our servers.
question_6: Can I use the generated music commercially?
answer_6: Yes, you have all commercial rights to use the music created with our tool.
